ygData.subject: Re: New bard website
ygData.msgSnippet: Not exactly, but if you submit new information that can be verified you will receive credit for it on the site, ie your name will appear before the factoid.
ygData.messageBody:
Not exactly, but if you submit new information that can be verified you will
receive credit for it on the site, ie your name will appear before the
factoid. Also some songs do not have extensive analysis yet, so if you
submit one it will be noted as well. I had thought about doing something
like that, but decided not to due to the fact the web space I am using is
not mine, but a friends. And did not want to put up something that might
grow out of control, as us Bards are highly opinionated :)

Rokenn Swiftsong - Karana server

>ala Everlore?
>
>Dank McGillicuty
